description: Billy is taking a shower while Sean is picking up the room. Sean sees Billy's phone and notices that he just got a text message and it reads how good of a fuck he was. Sean is livid and doesn't know what to do as he almost storms the bathroom door to confront Billy in the shower. Sean holds himself back and instead waits for him to come out and he then fucks him hard and deep. Sean hints to the text message as they are fucking and sucking because this is Sean's revenge fuck and once he blows his load all over Billy he tells him all that he knows about the cheating. Enjoy!
title: Cheated
